title: My Master
description: Jessica Scott had caught her husband Damon in yet another infidelity, but this time he seemed to really want to change. He sends Jessica on a month long vacation alone to think about their marriage. Jessica has new hope that her marriage can be saved. Until she finds out that Damon sent her to a remote island to be tutored sexually. She is devastated by Damon’s betrayal. That is Until Jessica sees Master, who awakens a deep sexual need in her, she never knew existed. Master’s word is law on this island and all are to obey or else they are punished. Everyone who lays eyes on Master has no intention on disobeying him. In fact all can’t wait to please him. Master is intrigued by the timid Jessica Scott. This little woman instantly does what no other woman has managed to do, capture Master’s heart. They both go on an erotic journey of love, lust and everything in between.
author: Justus Roux
